reviews.text:
The local rivalry between East and West Croydon Stations may be fierce but I have to take connectivity over amenities any day of the week.

That said...I do find the walkway down the platform unnecessarily long.

Not the greatest Station in comparison to other local places. But it brings back memories. The staff usually are ok. The place isn't as aesthetic or clean as it could be. But it is just a basic Train Station. The area isn't the most pleasant so that could be a factor.

A mixed picture.  Good station and staff and southern services is fine. The London overground service however is atrocious. Trains frequently overcrowded and delayed plus they frequently reroute WCY trains to Crystal Palace

Quite a run down station that's located nearby West Croydon Bus Station, which I guess is nice. You do have to walk a bit for step free access on either platforms and the ticket barrier/ticket office here is rather cramped, especially during the rush hour as there's lots of people passing through.

This station is really bad! The staff were ignorant and horrible and a Dispatcher didn't like me filming and He decided to drag me down the Platform and expect that a 12 year old would travel 60 miles alone! Then he just said, you need permission, What a Horrible Station. Never come here for train spotting, The staff are rude.
